title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8125.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8125.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 13
between Thruway exit 34 and the Madison-Oneida county line in the Village of

Canastota and the Town of Lenox. (b) Route 12. Route 12 between the

Oneida-Madison county line and the Chenango-Madison county line in the Towns of

Brookfield and Hamilton. (c) Route
20. Route 20 between the Onondaga-Madison county line and the Oneida-Madison
county line in the Villages of Cazenovia, Morrisville and Madison and in the

Towns of Cazenovia, Nelson, Eaton and Madison. (d) [Eff. until July 11, 2001, see also subd. (d) below.] Route 5. Route 5 between Route 13 (South Peterboro Street) and the

Oneida-Madison county line, in the City of Oneida, Villages of Canastota and

Wampsville and the Town of Lenox. (d) [Eff. July 11, 2001, see also subd. (d)
above.] Route 5. Route 5 between the Madison-Onondaga county line and the

Madison-Oneida county line, in the City of Oneida, Villages of Chittenango, Canastota and Wampsville and the Towns of Sullivan and Lenox. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8125.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
